channel.title: Changelog Feed
channel.description: Changes for each version of the software.

item.title: Version 1.108.41 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.108.41

  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m ScrollContainer: unstable QUnit tests are now skipped
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Table: Table content mixup when grouping and growing
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.MultiComboBox: Reposition ValueStateHeader when long text is set
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.core.qunit.i18n.UniversalDateUtils.qunit.js: Improve test stability for different time zones
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.core.qunit.i18n.UniversalDateUtils.qunit.js: Fix failing tests
    • Type: FIX, Description: core/IconPool: make mime type match case insensitive
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/ui/model/odata/ODataMetadata#__getPropertyMetadata: fix nested complex type properties
  • Library: sap.uxap
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.uxap.ObjectPageLayout: Remove restrictions for text size

item.title: Version 1.108.42 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.108.42

  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: Table: Prevent error when opening menu
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.calendar.Month: Improve day re-rendering peformance
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/ui/model/odata/v2/ODataModel: updating properties of type Edm.Binary
  • Library: sap.ui.unified
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.calendar.Month: Improve day re-rendering peformance
  • Library: sap.uxap
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.uxap.BlockBase: Error with duplicate ID prevented

item.title: Version 1.108.43 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.108.43

  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that a PDF loads irrespective of the contentType if isTrustedSource is set to true
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.SinglePlanningCalendar: appointments customData aggregation is written in DOM now
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: Introduce caching for sap/base/i18n/Localization
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.core.format.NumberFormat: Invalid groupingSize configuration disables grouping
  • Library: sap.ui.fl
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.fl: Fix bug where select roles dialog could not be opened when no business role description is present
  • Library: sap.ui.mdc
    • Type: FIX, Description: MDC: Include AdaptationFilterBar triggerSearch before invalidation

item.title: Version 1.120.32 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.120.32

  • Library: sap.f
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.SidePanel: side panel can be closed now
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now introduced a private read only flag to help the developers determine item sync delegation for the upload complete and item deletion actions
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: ThemeManager: Add detection for CSS preloads
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/ui/model/odata/v2/ODataModel: updating properties of type Edm.Binary
  • Library: sap.ui.fl
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.fl: Fix bug where select roles dialog could not be opened when no business role description is present
  • Library: sap.ui.unified
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.Calendar: works correctly now
  • Library: sap.uxap
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.uxap.ObjectPageLayout: Improve accessibility behavior
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.uxap.ObjectPageSubSection: Fix table flickering
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.uxap.ObjectPageLayout: Improve accessibility behavior
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.uxap.BlockBase: Error with duplicate ID prevented

item.title: Version 1.120.29 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.120.29

  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Input, sap.m.ComboBoxBase: Tests on macOS corrected
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.InputBase: Redundant announcement on error state removed
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.MessageView: Navigate to details view when title is too long
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.MultiComboBox: Speech output corrected
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Input: ValueStateMessage with FormattedText displays links twice
    • Type: FIX, Description: Input controls with Suggestions: Value State message in header is no longer focusable
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: core/IconPool: make mime type match case insensitive

item.title: Version 1.120.30 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.120.30

  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m ScrollContainer: unstable QUnit tests are now skipped
    • Type: FIX, Description: DateRangeSelection: Same separator for both date inputs
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've fixed issue where noDataText and noDataDescription was not getting set correctly
  • Library: sap.uxap
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.uxap.ObjectPageLayout: Remove restrictions for text size

item.title: Version 1.120.31 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.120.31

  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: Input controls: announced text is now following the guidelines
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.NotificationList: Focus correctly restored
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now fixed an issue where the illustratedMessage provided by a user was being overridden
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.calendar.Month: Improve day re-rendering peformance
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now enabled the screen reader announcement for navigation and action tiles
    • Type: FIX, Description: m.VariantManagement: correct overlap when in text mode
  • Library: sap.ui.unified
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.calendar.Month: Improve day re-rendering peformance

item.title: Version 1.120.33 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.120.33

  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.ObjectStatus: Fix title / text alignment of inverted status
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.NotificationList: Focus handling on item removal is now fixed
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that a PDF loads irrespective of the contentType if isTrustedSource is set to true
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.SinglePlanningCalendar: appointments customData aggregation is written in DOM now
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Page: headerContent controls are now selectable in UI Adapt mode
    • Type: FIX, Description: p13n.Engine: provide a way to pass event handler context to stateHandlerRegistry
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: Introduce caching for sap/base/i18n/Localization
    • Type: FIX, Description: base/DataType: log error once per class and property combination
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.core.format.NumberFormat: Invalid groupingSize configuration disables grouping
  • Library: sap.ui.mdc
    • Type: FIX, Description: P13nBuilder: load flex before usage
  • Library: sap.ui.rta
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Page: headerContent controls are now selectable in UI Adapt mode
  • Library: sap.uxap
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.uxap.ObjectPageLayout: Fix AnchorBar accessibility
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.uxap.ObjectPageSection: Fix fast navigation

item.title: Version 1.120.34 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.120.34

  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.SinglePlanningCalendarGrid: get appointment domref correctly
    • Type: FIX, Description: List: Avoid aria-describedby="null"
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.model.json.JSONPropertyBinding.js#checkUpdate: Fix logic to determine whether an update of the DataState has to be done
  • Library: sap.uxap
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.uxpa.ObjectPageSubSection: Improved key handling
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.uxap.ObjectPageLayout: Improve accessibility behavior

item.title: Version 1.130.7 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.130.7

  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m ScrollContainer: unstable QUnit tests are now skipped
    • Type: FIX, Description: CellSelector: Ignore "hidden grouped" columns when selecting

item.title: Version 1.130.8 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.130.8

  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now enabled the screen reader announcement for navigation and action tiles
  • Library: sap.ui.mdc
    • Type: FIX, Description: Empty Filter for navigation properties

item.title: Version 1.133.3 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.133.3

  • Library: sap.f
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.SidePanel: side panel can be closed now
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now introduced a private read only flag to help the developers determine item sync delegation for the upload complete and item deletion actions
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now enabled the screen reader announcement for navigation and action tiles
  • Library: sap.ui.mdc
    • Type: FIX, Description: Empty Filter for navigation properties

item.title: Version 1.133.1 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.133.1

  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now use messageBundle to set the text for the Upload button
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.MultiComboBox: Enable typing with virtual keyboard on Mac
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.FormattedText: Formatting issue fixed
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.Calendar: The calendar week configuration has been properly applied
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.core.format.NumberFormat#format: Fix wrong number of decimals in scientific notation
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/ui/model/odata/v2/ODataModel#createEntry: ignore transient context if path is absolute
  • Library: sap.ui.unified
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.Calendar: The calendar week configuration has been properly applied
  • Library: sap.uxap
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.uxap.ObjectPageSubSection: Adjustment class added for table

item.title: Version 1.133.2 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.133.2

  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m ScrollContainer: unstable QUnit tests are now skipped
    • Type: FIX, Description: CellSelector: Ignore "hidden grouped" columns when selecting
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Tokenizer:popover width adjusted to spec

item.title: Version 1.135.0 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.135.0

  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.m.DateRangeSelection & DateTimePicker: maxLength attribute added
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: DOMPurify: Updated to version 3.2.4
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: List: formsMode keyboard interaction refinements (Revert)
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: List: formsMode keyboard interaction refinements
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.TimePicker: segmented button text is not truncated now
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.TabContainer: close button in the select drop down is announced now
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.TabContainer: icons are displayed correctly in HCB and HCW themes
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.DynamicDateRange: whole text is shown in popup footer
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.DateTimeField: Align both value state messages
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Input: remove focus of suggestion item
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now use messageBundle to set the text for the Upload button
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.MultiInput: Do not collapse tokenizer after input
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.SplitApp: Fix text page
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.LightBox: Initial focus is now set
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Dialog: Fix dialog acc text page
    • Type: FIX, Description: ListBase: Remove RangeSelection on onItemContextMenu
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.MultiInput: Fix documentation related to the "N-more" link
    • Type: FIX, Description: Input controls with Suggestions: Value State message in header is no longer focusable
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Input: Speech output for table suggestions is now enhanced
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Tokenizer: Fix failing qUnit tests
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now fixed the overlap banner issue in OneByOne type genericTile and we've also removed the application of active state color of the banner
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Breadcrumbs: Fix issue when in OFT's Popover
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.DateTimePicker: TimePicker part now is properly initialized
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Popover: Closing animation is now working properly
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.PullToRefresh: Fix failing test on 2.0
    • Type: FIX, Description: File rename will fire the itemRenamed event on completion & will not trigger model updates in UploadsetwithTable plugin
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.PlanningCalendar: remove warning message
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Popover: Scrolling issue in popover with overflowing content is now resolved
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.MultiComboBox: Enable typing with virtual keyboard on Mac
  • Library: sap.tnt
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.tnt.SideNavigation: Update visual design
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.tnt.NavigationListItem: fix firing of press event in popover items
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.tnt.ToolPage: visual test is fixed
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.tnt.SideNavigation: documentation is adjusted for Overlay mode sample
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.tnt.SideNavigation: Selected state without icon is fixed
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: KeyboardInteractionEndpoint: Don't log error on each postmessage
    • Type: FIX, Description: ResourceBundle: Log async create error / throw in future versions
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.test.autoWaiter: QUnit stabilized
    • Type: FIX, Description: core/IconPool: make mime type match case insensitive
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/ui/model/odata/ODataMetadata#__getPropertyMetadata: fix nested complex type properties
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/ui/model/odata/v2/ODataModel: no caching of metadata with cache buster segment
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.core.ShortcutHintsMixin: shows correctly the tooltip on mouseover
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.test: Fix failing test on 2.0
  • Library: sap.ui.documentation
    • Type: FIX, Description: Demo Kit: DataTables improvements
    • Type: FIX, Description: DemoKit: Integration test cookie cleaup improved
    • Type: FIX, Description: DemoKit: Deprecated API usage replaced
    • Type: FIX, Description: Demo Kit: Datatables improved
  • Library: sap.ui.integration
    • Type: FIX, Description: Card Explorer: Events from previous card sample are no longer displayed on the current
    • Type: FIX, Description: Integration Cards: Improved showCard method
  • Library: sap.ui.layout
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: ColumnLayout: render as <dl> in display mode
  • Library: sap.ui.mdc
    • Type: FIX, Description: Field: opening dropdown selects first item
    • Type: FIX, Description: MultiValueField: closing token-popover looses focus
    • Type: FIX, Description: MDC.ValueHelp: Reconfigure ValueHelp on defaultRow in _updateRow
    • Type: FIX, Description: Field: old Typeahed item announced by arrow navigation
    • Type: FIX, Description: MDC.ValueHelp: Popover promise handling improvements
    • Type: FIX, Description: Field: Boolean default help - no title on phone
  • Library: sap.ui.unified
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.CalendarTimeInterval: is displayed correctly now
  • Library: sap.uxap
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.uxap.ObjectPageSectionBase: API for effective title level
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.uxap.BlockBase: Fix not showing "moreBlocks"
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.uxap.ObjectPageSubSection: Header padding fixed
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.uxap.ObjectPageLayout: Incorrect selectedSection prevented
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.uxap.BlockBase: Fix failing QUnit on 2.0
  • Library: deprecated
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.m.ValueCSSColor#undefined] the concept has been discarded.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.tnt.IToolHeader#undefined] This interface is not needed anymore. The <code>ToolPage</code> now accepts any control as a header or subheader.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.layout.cssgrid.CSSGridGapShortHand#undefined] use {@link sap.ui.core.CSSGapShortHand} instead

item.title: Version 1.136.0 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.136.0

  • Library: sap.f
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: Integration Card: Header Info Section is now implemented
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We've now introduced fileNameValidationConfig property to configure the restricted character set for file name validation in the UploadSetwithTable plugin
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.m.Wizard: Enable F6 support
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We've now introduced customPageContenthandler property hook within the FilePreviewDialog control to display custom content for unsupported file types
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.WizardStep: Title propagation id is adapted
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Menu: End content controls properly applied
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.MultiInput: Tokenizer Opener is now adjusted
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Input: Value state is correctly hidden
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m ScrollContainer: unstable QUnit tests are now skipped
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Tokenizer: fix exception throwing
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m ScrollContainer: unstable QUnit tests are now fixed
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Wizard: Fix F6 navigation
    • Type: FIX, Description: DateRangeSelection: Same separator for both date inputs
    • Type: FIX, Description: CellSelector: Ignore "hidden grouped" columns when selecting
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Label: Avoid truncation of last character in Info toolbar
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Select: Enhanced error handling
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the correct instance of the plugin and control is set within the UploadSetWithTable plugin
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now improved the image scaling and carousel preview for UploadSetwithTable
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.InputBase: Redundant announcement on error state removed
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Input, sap.m.ComboBoxBase: Tests on macOS corrected
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Input: prevent displaying password value when switching type
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the download API of UploadsetwithTable handles the blob file type responses for the files that are to be downloaded
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m ScrollContainer: unstable QUnit tests are now fixed
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.RatingIndicator: Correct value and UI sync during fast drag interactions
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.ActionSheet: Close popup on tab next / previous
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.Calendar: range selection continues across pickers
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Popover: Redundant horizontal scrollbar is now removed from Firefox
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Tokenizer: Adjust popover width according to visual specifications
    • Type: FIX, Description: core.Popup: make Popup.Dock enum have identical key and value
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.MultiInput: check maxTokens when pasting tokens
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Wizard: Open ActionSheet when 1 title is truncated
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Image: DOMPurify fix
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.MultiComboBox: Visual tests corrected
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.SinglePlanningCalendar: now marker announcement is removed as part of the region
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Tokenizer: Prevent Scrolling upon Token delete
  • Library: sap.tnt
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.tnt.NavigationListItem: Child items are properly expanded or collapsed
  • Library: sap.ui.commons
    • Type: FIX, Description: core.Popup: make Popup.Dock enum have identical key and value
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: Controller: remove static functions
    • Type: FIX, Description: KeyboardInteractionDisplay: Fix detection of related controls
    • Type: FIX, Description: KeyboardInteractionDisplay: Fix missing interactions
    • Type: FIX, Description: mvc/XMLView: Add typeof checks to resolve controller module name
    • Type: FIX, Description: core.Popup: make Popup.Dock enum have identical key and value
    • Type: FIX, Description: KeyboardInteractionEndpoint: Don't log error on each postmessage
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/base/Log: Update documentation regarding support info logging
  • Library: sap.ui.documentation
    • Type: FIX, Description: Demo Kit: Make Accessibility Guide available on phone devices
    • Type: FIX, Description: Demo Kit: Fix card header padding structure
    • Type: FIX, Description: Demo Kit: Remove phone visibility restrictions
    • Type: FIX, Description: DemoKit: Error prevented
    • Type: FIX, Description: Demo Kit: Fix Highlighting spaces
  • Library: sap.ui.fl
    • Type: FIX, Description: Controller: remove static functions
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.fl: Improve FlexInfoSession cleanup
  • Library: sap.ui.integration
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: Integration Card: Header Info Section is now implemented
  • Library: sap.ui.mdc
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: mdc.Table: Option to enable column freeze P13n (GridTableType)
    • Type: FIX, Description: Empty Filter for navigation properties
    • Type: FIX, Description: Field: wrong error message on number for currency or unit
    • Type: FIX, Description: MultiValueField: don't open valueHelp on more-indicator
    • Type: FIX, Description: Field: Label mapping for inner control missing
  • Library: sap.ui.rta
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.uxap.ObjectPageLayout: Action buttons in OverflowToolbar
  • Library: sap.ui.table
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: mdc.Table: Option to enable column freeze P13n (GridTableType)
    • Type: FIX, Description: GridTable: Set correct rowindex for Multi Headers
  • Library: sap.ui.unified
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.Calendar: range selection continues across pickers
    • Type: FIX, Description: core.Popup: make Popup.Dock enum have identical key and value
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.FileUploader: Selected file stays selected
  • Library: sap.ui.ux3
    • Type: FIX, Description: core.Popup: make Popup.Dock enum have identical key and value
  • Library: sap.uxap
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.uxap.ObjectPageLayout: Action buttons in OverflowToolbar
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.uxap.ObjectPageLayout: Fix scrollTop of single SubSection
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.uxap.ObjectPageLayout: Section title in anchorBar corrected
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.uxap.ObjectPageLayout: Improve accessibility behavior
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.uxap.ObjectPageSectionBase: aria-level attribute added
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.uxap.ObjectPageLyout: CSS class name corrected
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.uxap.ObjectPageLayout: Description corrected
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.uxap.ObjectPageLayout: Remove restrictions for text size
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.uxap.ObjectPageSection: Fix fast navigation
  • Library: deprecated
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.core.mvc.Controller#registerExtensionProvider] without replacement, the extension provider concept is intended for framework internal use only.

item.title: Version 1.136.1 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.136.1

  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: CellSelector: Prevent selection if drag & drop enabled
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now introduced a private read only flag to help the developers determine item sync delegation for the upload complete and item deletion actions
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.DynamicDateRange: shows correctly the time part now
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.PlanningCalendarRow: custom header row background on hover is correct now
    • Type: FIX, Description: Input controls: announced text is now following the guidelines
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the correct download parameter is set while downloading uploaded items using the table's download functionality
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the image inside a slide tile is adjusted based on the width of the tile
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: core/interaction: Enhance Interaction Protocol for translation
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/ui/model/odata/v2/ODataModel: updating properties of type Edm.Binary
    • Type: FIX, Description: core/Element: use getter from prototype for 'nodeName'
    • Type: FIX, Description: ControllerMetadata.qunit: registerExtensionProvider deprecation
  • Library: sap.ui.fl
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.fl: Fix bug where ContextBasedAdaptationsAPI.create does not consider manifest and annotation changes
  • Library: sap.ui.mdc
    • Type: FIX, Description: FilterField: show more-indicator on focus to other field
  • Library: sap.uxap
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.uxap.ObjectPageSubSection: Fix table flickering
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.uxap.ObjectPageSubSection: prevent duplicate ID error
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.uxap.BlockBase: Error with duplicate ID prevented
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.uxap.ObjectPageLayout: Fix visibility of title IconTabBar mode
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.uxap.ObjectPageSubSection: ensure consistent async unstashing

item.title: Version 1.136.2 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.136.2

  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.IconTabBar: Fix flexibility change handler
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Button: focus the button on mobile before firing press event
    • Type: FIX, Description: p13n.xConfigAPI: enhanceConfig with conditional destroy
    • Type: FIX, Description: MDCTable: Hide settings icon in ColumnMenu
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.MultiInput: tokens list stays opened for readonly MultiInput
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.ui.core: make sap/ui/Device a standard AMD module
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap/ui/base: enable static inheritance for UI5 classes
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: Make the experimental new bootstrap the productive one
    • Type: FIX, Description: core/KeyboardInteractionDisplay: Fix Normalization of single keys
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.base.config: fix logging for URL parameters
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/ui/core/AppCAcheBuster.js: Core.ready() does not resolve
  • Library: sap.ui.layout
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: SimpleForm: use ColumnLayout as default
  • Library: sap.ui.mdc
    • Type: FIX, Description: Mdc.FieldBase: Mark keydown event on escape-induced valuehelp close
    • Type: FIX, Description: MDCTable: Hide settings icon in ColumnMenu
  • Library: sap.uxap
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.uxap.ObjectPageSubSection: Action visualization issue fixed
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.uxap.ObjectPageSubSection: Fix cloning of "actions"

item.title: Version 1.136.3 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.136.3

  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.QuickViewPage: Remove synchronous request during initalization
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.OverflowToolbar: Layout issue caused by empty item prevented
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.IconTabBar: focus outline is fixed for high contrast themes
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Tokenizer: Tokens are properly updated in the n-more list after delete
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Tokenizer: aria-controls attribute is now set correctly
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.NotificationList: Focus handling on item removal is now fixed
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.ui.core: make sap/ui/Device a standard AMD module
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap/ui/base: enable static inheritance for UI5 classes
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: Make the experimental new bootstrap the productive one
    • Type: FIX, Description: core: Prevent BlockLayer from being considered as focus candidate
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.model.json.JSONPropertyBinding.js#checkUpdate: Fix logic to determine whether an update of the DataState has to be done
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.model.odata.v2.ODataAnnotations: Propagate 'withCredentials' flag when loading annotations
    • Type: FIX, Description: Introduce caching for sap/base/i18n/Localization
    • Type: FIX, Description: base/DataType: log error once per class and property combination
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.base.config: fix logging for URL parameters
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/ui/core/AppCAcheBuster.js: Core.ready() does not resolve
  • Library: sap.ui.layout
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: SimpleForm: use ColumnLayout as default

item.title: Version 1.136.4 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.136.4

  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: List: Avoid aria-describedby="null"
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.QuickViewPage: Remove synchronous request during initalization
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.OverflowToolbar: Layout issue caused by empty item prevented
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Wizard: aria-labelledby invisible text is set correctly
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.IconTabBar: focus outline is fixed for high contrast themes
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Tokenizer: Tokens are properly updated in the n-more list after delete
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Tokenizer: aria-controls attribute is now set correctly
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.NotificationList: Focus handling on item removal is now fixed
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.ui.core: make sap/ui/Device a standard AMD module
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap/ui/base: enable static inheritance for UI5 classes
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: Make the experimental new bootstrap the productive one
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/ui/model/type/Unit.js: if quantity part is integer, decimals defaults to '0', may be overwritten
    • Type: FIX, Description: core/Popup: handle shadow DOM as opener
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/ui/model/type/Unit.js: if measure part is integer, set decimals to '0'
    • Type: FIX, Description: core: Prevent BlockLayer from being considered as focus candidate
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.model.json.JSONPropertyBinding.js#checkUpdate: Fix logic to determine whether an update of the DataState has to be done
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.model.odata.v2.ODataAnnotations: Propagate 'withCredentials' flag when loading annotations
    • Type: FIX, Description: Introduce caching for sap/base/i18n/Localization
    • Type: FIX, Description: base/DataType: log error once per class and property combination
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.base.config: fix logging for URL parameters
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/ui/core/AppCAcheBuster.js: Core.ready() does not resolve
  • Library: sap.ui.documentation
    • Type: FIX, Description: Demo Kit: Remove redundant version visibility
  • Library: sap.ui.layout
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: SimpleForm: use ColumnLayout as default
  • Library: sap.ui.mdc
    • Type: FIX, Description: PropertyHelperUtil: check UI5 2.0 availability by deprecations

item.title: Version 1.136.5 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.136.5

  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: List: Avoid aria-describedby="null"
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.QuickViewPage: Remove synchronous request during initalization
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.OverflowToolbar: Layout issue caused by empty item prevented
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Wizard: aria-labelledby invisible text is set correctly
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.IconTabBar: focus outline is fixed for high contrast themes
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Tokenizer: Tokens are properly updated in the n-more list after delete
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Tokenizer: aria-controls attribute is now set correctly
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.NotificationList: Focus handling on item removal is now fixed
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.ui.core: make sap/ui/Device a standard AMD module
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap/ui/base: enable static inheritance for UI5 classes
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: Make the experimental new bootstrap the productive one
    • Type: FIX, Description: Add polyfill for Promise.withResolvers
    • Type: FIX, Description: ThemeManager: Derive dist version from preloaded CSS URL
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/ui/model/type/Unit.js: if quantity part is integer, decimals defaults to '0', may be overwritten
    • Type: FIX, Description: core/Popup: handle shadow DOM as opener
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/ui/model/type/Unit.js: if measure part is integer, set decimals to '0'
    • Type: FIX, Description: core: Prevent BlockLayer from being considered as focus candidate
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.model.json.JSONPropertyBinding.js#checkUpdate: Fix logic to determine whether an update of the DataState has to be done
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.model.odata.v2.ODataAnnotations: Propagate 'withCredentials' flag when loading annotations
    • Type: FIX, Description: Introduce caching for sap/base/i18n/Localization
    • Type: FIX, Description: base/DataType: log error once per class and property combination
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.base.config: fix logging for URL parameters
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/ui/core/AppCAcheBuster.js: Core.ready() does not resolve
  • Library: sap.ui.documentation
    • Type: FIX, Description: Demo Kit: Remove redundant version visibility
  • Library: sap.ui.integration
    • Type: FIX, Description: Integration Cards: Creation of duplicate SAC widgets is now prevented
  • Library: sap.ui.layout
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: SimpleForm: use ColumnLayout as default
  • Library: sap.ui.mdc
    • Type: FIX, Description: PropertyHelperUtil: check UI5 2.0 availability by deprecations

item.title: Version 1.136.6 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.136.6

  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.SplitApp: busy indicator layer is now also over the master container
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.DynamicDateFormat: Sanitizing a pattern when creating a regex
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Button: has correct css parameters for active Emphasized
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: routing/History: avoid creating history entry when same hash is applied
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/ui/core/LocaleData: getAllCurrencyDigits ignores CLDR in case of custom currencies with DEFAULT
  • Library: sap.ui.mdc
    • Type: FIX, Description: MultiValueField not working after upgrading to 1.136.1

item.title: Version 1.138.0 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.138.0

  • Library: sap.f
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: Integration Cards: The `actions` property for the content of an Object Card is now deprecated
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.SidePanel: side panel can be closed now
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.DynamicPageHeader: fix headerContentLabel upon snap/unsnap
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.m.Menu: endContent documentation is now updated
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: MenuItem: Add aria-expanded attribute
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap-icons-tnt: Updated icon fonts to v3.8 and v3.7 for Horizon, and to v2.13 and v2.12 respectively for older themes
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.ui.core.IconPool: Update icon font v5.12 and v4.24
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.StepInput: does not work with negative numbers
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.ObjectMarker: text is displayed with small letter
    • Type: FIX, Description: MDCTable: Hide settings icon in ColumnMenu
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Menu: fixed context menu auto-closing in some cases
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.StepInput: make binding higher prio
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now replaced the instanceof check for promises sent to itemValidationHandler with thenable check to handle the pollyfilled promises in UploadSetwithTable
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.IllustratedMessage: Aligned English translation texts
    • Type: FIX, Description: QueryPanel: move item looses focus
    • Type: FIX, Description: Illustration Explorer: Fix deprecated illustrations handling and integration tests
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.PlanningCalendar: fixed rowHeaderPress event firing
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.ViewSettingsDialog: Update reset announce message for the screen reader
    • Type: FIX, Description: p13n.Engine: provide a way to pass event handler context to stateHandlerRegistry
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.PlanningCalendar: remove overriden setter for property multipleAppointmentsSelection since the functionality was moved in onBeforeRendering
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Menu: fixed context menu positioning
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.NotofictionListGroup: Press is fired on enter
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Button: Default button has correct hover color
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Tokenizer: aria-controls attribute is now set correctly
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.PlanningCalendar: property multipleAppointmentsSelection is not working when set in XML view
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Menu: fixed context menu positioning when only oordinates are provided
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.IconTabBar: Font rendering issue in Safari is fixed
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Avatar: Typo fixed jsdoc
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.ViewSettingsDialog: Reset action announcement added
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.MultiInput: tokens list stays opened for readonly MultiInput
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now set the decorative property of avatar to true for action tile
    • Type: FIX, Description: CellSelector: Prevent selection if drag & drop enabled
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Button: has correct color in info toolbar
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Menu: CSS classes are propagated to the submenus
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.DynamicDateRange: shows correctly the time part now
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Menu: MenuWrapper does not throw JS error when trying to close submenu
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.IconTabHeader: prevent Firefox warning by avoiding getElementById with empty ID
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now introduced a private read only flag to help the developers determine item sync delegation for the upload complete and item deletion actions
  • Library: sap.tnt
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap-icons-tnt: Updated icon fonts to v3.8 and v3.7 for Horizon, and to v2.13 and v2.12 respectively for older themes
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.tnt.NavigationList: prevent focus loss on popover close and reopen
  • Library: sap.ui.commons
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.commons.ToolbarRightItems: fix unstable tests
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: WebComponents - make base classes non-experimental
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.ui.core.IconPool: Update icon font v5.12 and v4.24
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: Remove 3rdparty that is no longer used in SAPUI5 code
    • Type: FIX, Description: core/KeyboardInteractionDisplay: Fix Normalization of single keys
    • Type: FIX, Description: src/sap.ui.core/src/sap/ui/core/.library: Update URL of datajs to correct one
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/ui/model/odata/v2/ODataModel: updating properties of type Edm.Binary
  • Library: sap.ui.documentation
    • Type: FIX, Description: Demo Kit: Allow module github links to OpenUI5 modules
    • Type: FIX, Description: Demo Kit: APIREF Module link fixed
  • Library: sap.ui.fl
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.fl: Fix bug where select roles dialog could not be opened when no role description is present
  • Library: sap.ui.integration
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: Integration Cards: The `actions` property for the content of an Object Card is now deprecated
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: Integration Cards: Support for text/plain content type in data requests is now added
    • Type: FIX, Description: Integration Cards: Changing a filter value now fires stateChanged event
  • Library: sap.ui.mdc
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: Field, FilterField: render Select for fixed value lists
    • Type: FIX, Description: MDCTable: Hide settings icon in ColumnMenu
    • Type: FIX, Description: FilterField: DynamicDateRange wrong Operator used
    • Type: FIX, Description: MDCTable update selection on opening if conditions not changed
    • Type: FIX, Description: MultiValueField: aria-label not assigned to Tokenizer
    • Type: FIX, Description: FilterField: show more-indicator on focus to other field
  • Library: sap.ui.unified
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.m.Menu: endContent documentation is now updated
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: MenuItem: Add aria-expanded attribute
  • Library: sap.uxap
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.uxap.ObjectPageLayout: Fix initial title rendering in FCL
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.uxap.ObjectPageSubsection: No role for promoted subsection
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.uxap.ObjectPageLayout: Improve accessibility behavior
  • Library: deprecated
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.mdc.valuehelp.content.Bool#setEmptyText] setting of this property is not supported, the property is automatically set.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.mdc.valuehelp.content.Bool#setRestrictedToFixedValues] setting of this property is not supported, the property is automatically set.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.model.analytics.AnalyticalBinding#undefined] will be replaced by OData V4 data aggregation, see {@link topic:7d914317c0b64c23824bf932cc8a4ae1 Extension for Data Aggregation}
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.model.analytics.AnalyticalTreeBindingAdapter#undefined] will be replaced by OData V4 data aggregation, see {@link topic:7d914317c0b64c23824bf932cc8a4ae1 Extension for Data Aggregation}
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.model.analytics.odata4analytics#undefined] will be replaced by OData V4 data aggregation, see {@link topic:7d914317c0b64c23824bf932cc8a4ae1 Extension for Data Aggregation}
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.model.analytics#ODataModelAdapter] will be replaced by OData V4 data aggregation, see {@link topic:7d914317c0b64c23824bf932cc8a4ae1 Extension for Data Aggregation}
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.model.odata#ODataTreeBindingAdapter] will be replaced by OData V4 hierarchy functionality, see {@link topic:7d914317c0b64c23824bf932cc8a4ae1/section_RCH Recursive Hierarchy}

item.title: Version 1.139.0 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.139.0

  • Library: sap.f
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.f.FlexibleColumnLayout: Column resize using Up and Down keys enabled
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: Integration Cards: Child cards now reuse destinations from main card
    • Type: FIX, Description: Integration Cards: Manifest Resolver sample is fixed
    • Type: FIX, Description: Integration cards: CardVariants test page is fixed
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now support the use of UploadSetwithTable plugin in the Tree Table control
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We've now enabled actions on the FeedInput control
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.m.OverflowToolbarTokenizer: sap.m.Tokenizer is now integrated into the Toolbar and OverflowToolbar controls
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.m.Menu: Accessibility improvements
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.IconTabBar: Unnecessary bold on tab text is now removed
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Menu: fixed endContent controls `press` event firing
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.QuickViewPage: Remove synchronous request during initalization
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.OverflowToolbar: Layout issue caused by empty item prevented
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.SinglePlanningCalendarMonthGrid: fixed Month view layout (320-340px)
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Menu: fixed menu opening when items are bound to OData V4 model
    • Type: FIX, Description: List: Avoid aria-describedby="null"
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Menu: Focus handling for Menu open/close
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Toolbar: Legacy API removed from test
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Input: Invisible message is announced correctly
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.PlanningCalendar: header interval announcements adjusted
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.ObjectNumber: labelledby properly applied
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.SplitButton: type announcement adjusted
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.ObjectStatus: retain the minimum height of the empty placeholder
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now set the width of the File Preview dialog to 100% for the UploadSetWithTable plugin
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.PlanningCalendar: introduce "level" and "titleStyle" properties to sap.m.PlanningCalendar header title
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Toolbar: Focus issue prevented
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.OverflowToolbar: fix scrolling down the page
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.MultiInput: valueHelpIconSrc is applied correctly in mobile view
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.IconTabBar: Test for flexibility changes improved
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.NotificationList: Focus handling on item removal is now fixed
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now removed ExportUtil dependency for file downloads in the UploadSetwithTable plugin
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.ObjectMarker: The default action is prevented now when clicking on the icon
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.NotificationList: Focus handling on item removal is now fixed
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.SemanticConfiguration: Improved text
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.MultiComboBox: value state error is now reset correctly
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Wizard: aria-labelledby invisible text is set correctly
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that a PDF loads irrespective of the contentType if isTrustedSource is set to true
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.CheckBox: Wrapping in display-only mode corrected
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Link: icon is correctly aligned now
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.IconTabBar: Fix flexibility change handler
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.SinglePlanningCalendar: appointments customData aggregation is written in DOM now
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Button: focus the button on mobile before firing press event
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.ObjectStatus: displayed correctly now
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.IconTabBar: focus outline is fixed for high contrast themes
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.SinglePlanningCalendar: specialDates doesn't support date ranges
    • Type: FIX, Description: p13n.xConfigAPI: enhanceConfig with conditional destroy
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.PlanningCalendar: toolbar does not overflow when it contains sap.m.Title
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Menu: fixed context menu positioning
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Button: Provide information about aria-shortcutkey in the button description
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.ColorPalette: adapt visual tests
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.PlanningCalendar move overriden setters in onBeforeRendering
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that a PDF loads irrespective of the contentType if isTrustedSource is set to true
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.SelectDialogBase: UI Flex restrictions now work correctly
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Page: headerContent controls are now selectable in UI Adapt mode
  • Library: sap.tnt
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.tnt.SideNavigation: no exceptions in the console
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.tnt.SideNavigation: Padding added at the end of the text
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.tnt: Link Shop Administration Tool app tests is now updated
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.tnt.NavigationListItem: Tooltip behavior is now changed
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap/ui/model/FilterOperator/NotAny and NotAll: Support for v4 ODataListBinding
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.model.json.JSONPropertyBinding.js#checkUpdate: Fix logic to determine whether an update of the DataState has to be done
    • Type: FIX, Description: core: Prevent BlockLayer from being considered as focus candidate
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.model.odata.v2.ODataAnnotations: Propagate 'withCredentials' flag when loading annotations
    • Type: FIX, Description: base/DataType: log error once per class and property combination
    • Type: FIX, Description: core/KeyboardInteractionDisplay: Fix Normalization of single keys
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.core.format.NumberFormat: Invalid groupingSize configuration disables grouping
    • Type: FIX, Description: ComponentContainer: always propagate propagation listeners
    • Type: FIX, Description: ResourceBundle: Improve performance
  • Library: sap.ui.documentation
    • Type: FIX, Description: Demo Kit: Remove redundant version visibility
    • Type: FIX, Description: Demo Kit: SubApiDetail variable name changed
    • Type: FIX, Description: Demo Kit: Hide news button if news-config.json is missing
    • Type: FIX, Description: Demo Kit: Redundant code in TopicDetail.controller.js removed
    • Type: FIX, Description: Demo Kit: Link to module fixed for nightly
    • Type: FIX, Description: DemoKit: Move inline styles to stylesheet file
    • Type: FIX, Description: Demo kit: Clear topic detail highlighting when search is cleared
    • Type: FIX, Description: DemoKit: Corrected samples RTA using wrapper component
    • Type: FIX, Description: DemoKit: Highlighting of code-blocks corrected
  • Library: sap.ui.fl
    • Type: FIX, Description: fl.VariantManagement: remove hardcoded supportDefault(true)
  • Library: sap.ui.integration
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: Integration Cards: Child cards now reuse destinations from main card
    • Type: FIX, Description: Integration Cards: Object cards no longer flicker when initializing
    • Type: FIX, Description: Integration Cards: Creation of duplicate SAC widgets is now prevented
  • Library: sap.ui.mdc
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: Empty-Operator: support different text for DynamicDateRange
    • Type: FIX, Description: Field: error message not removed if old value selected
    • Type: FIX, Description: P13nBuilder: load flex before usage
    • Type: FIX, Description: Field: error state not removed after reverting input
    • Type: FIX, Description: MultiValueField: demokit sample breaks
    • Type: FIX, Description: Container.isRestrictedToFixedValues fails if no Content
    • Type: FIX, Description: Mdc.FieldBase: Mark keydown event on escape-induced valuehelp close
    • Type: FIX, Description: ValueHelp: min width of SearchField.
    • Type: FIX, Description: Field: error handling if Currency/Unit chosen that don't meet number
  • Library: sap.ui.rta
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Page: headerContent controls are now selectable in UI Adapt mode
  • Library: sap.ui.unified
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.PlanningCalendar: header interval announcements adjusted
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.Calendar: specialDates customData aggregation is written in DOM
  • Library: sap.uxap
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.uxap.BlockBase: fix table cutting
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.uxap.ObjectPageSubSection: Action visualization issue fixed
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.uxap.ObjectPageSubSection: Fix cloning of "actions"

item.title: Version 1.140.0 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.140.0

  • Library: sap.f
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: Integration Cards: Child cards are now enabled to use main card destinations
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.f.ProductSwitchItem: Added imageSrc property
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.f.cards.BaseHeader: Reorganized the Card Header layout to relocate StatusText and timestamp
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.m.MessagePopover: enable title in header
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: Table: Add ODataV4-specific plugins for selection and tree support
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Menu: Added optional chaining to avoid errors when MenuWrapper is not present
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Menu: Fix binding of menu items
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Button: has correct css parameters for active Emphasized
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.SinglePlanningCalendarMonthGrid: fixed Month view layout (320-340px)
    • Type: FIX, Description: BasePanel: SelectAll/DeselectAll should respect filters
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.SplitApp: busy indicator layer is now also over the master container
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.DynamicDateRange: Empty custom option doesn't log error
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Carousel: use logical margin to correctly render RTL layouts
    • Type: FIX, Description: VariantManagement: Indicate version for setCurrentVariantKey
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Input: Align read-only input border
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.DynamicDateFormat: Sanitizing a pattern when creating a regex
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Checkbox: Correct non-editable checkbox alignment
    • Type: FIX, Description: SelectionPanel: Adjust "deselect all" to take all list items into account
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.IconTabHeader: Tests are stabilized
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Popover: Deprecated enum values are marked in code
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.OverflowToolbar: Fix failing test on 2.0
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Link: has smaller offset when in Table in condensed mode
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.RadioButton: Fixed Safari rendering issue with zoom behavior
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.IconTabBar: Unnecessary bold on tab text is now removed
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Popover: Calculate correct placement on resize
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Menu: fixed endContent controls `press` event firing
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.SinglePlanningCalendarGrid: get appointment domref correctly
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now applied 4px padding between the title and the image of the slide tile when height is less than 180px
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.QuickViewPage: Remove synchronous request during initalization
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.DynamicDateRange: options list accessibility semantics adjusted
  • Library: sap.tnt
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.m.IllustratedMessage: Update TNT set
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.tnt.SideNavigation: no exceptions in the console
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: Add TypedJSONModel
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.ui.core.webc.WebComponents: allow event mapping
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.ui.test: Expose opaTest.skip and opaTest.todo
    • Type: FIX, Description: routing/Route: Correctly join nested route patterns
    • Type: FIX, Description: ThemeManager: Always ensure postprocessing for preloaded CSS
    • Type: FIX, Description: Ensure adding CSS in the correct order for placeholder elements
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/ui/model/type/Unit.js: if quantity part is integer, decimals defaults to '0', may be overwritten
    • Type: FIX, Description: forced-color-adjust to html tag
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.core.format.NumberFormat#getDefaultUnitPattern: Replace normal space with non-breaking space
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/ui/model/type/Unit.js: if quantity part is integer, set decimals to '0'
    • Type: FIX, Description: ThemeManager: Improve robustness of versionInfo loading
  • Library: sap.ui.documentation
    • Type: FIX, Description: Demo Kit: Remove redundant version visibility
  • Library: sap.ui.integration
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: Integration Cards: Child cards are now enabled to use main card destinations
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.f.cards.BaseHeader: Reorganized the Card Header layout to relocate StatusText and timestamp
  • Library: sap.ui.layout
    • Type: FIX, Description: Form: title in toolbar wrong weight
  • Library: sap.ui.mdc
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: Table: Add ODataV4-specific plugins for selection and tree support
    • Type: FIX, Description: BasePanel: SelectAll/DeselectAll should respect filters
    • Type: FIX, Description: ActionToolbarAction: implement IToolbarInteractiveControl
    • Type: FIX, Description: mdc.FilterBar: Preserve whitespaces for labels
    • Type: FIX, Description: FilterField: typeahed leads to error in phone mode
    • Type: FIX, Description: TokenizerDisplay: show focus on more-indicatior like on Link
    • Type: FIX, Description: MultiValueField: no error on duplicate values
    • Type: FIX, Description: Field: clearing unit leads to "0"
    • Type: FIX, Description: PropertyHelperUtil: fix disablement for sap.sac.df
    • Type: FIX, Description: PropertyHelperUtil: check UI5 2.0 availability by deprecations
  • Library: sap.ui.table
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: Table: Add ODataV4-specific plugins for selection and tree support
  • Library: sap.uxap
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.uxap.ObjectPageSection: Invalid aria-labelledBy fixed
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.uxap.ObjectPageLayout: Prevent focus loss when header expanded
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.uxap.ObjectPageSubSection: Fix show more/show less buttons
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.uxap.ObjectPageLayout: Improve accessibility behavior

item.title: Version 1.38.65 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.38.65

  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.FormattedText: Formatting issue fixed
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/ui/core/qunit/DateFormat.qunit.html: Fix failing year two digits tests

item.title: Version 1.71.71 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.71.71

  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.FormattedText: Formatting issue fixed
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/ui/model/odata/ODataMetadata#__getPropertyMetadata: fix nested complex type properties

item.title: Version 1.71.72 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.71.72

  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that a PDF loads irrespective of the contentType if isTrustedSource is set to true
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now fixed an issue where the FeedInput text area remained greyed out even after being enabled
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m ScrollContainer: unstable QUnit tests are now skipped
  • Library: sap.ui.commons
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.commons.ToolbarRightItems: fix unstable tests
  • Library: sap.uxap
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.uxap.BlockBase: Error with duplicate ID prevented
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.uxap.ObjectPageLayout: Remove restrictions for text size

item.title: Version 1.96.39 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.96.39

  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.calendar.Month: Improve day re-rendering peformance
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m ScrollContainer: unstable QUnit tests are now skipped
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.MultiComboBox: Reposition ValueStateHeader when long text is set
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.model.odata.v4.lib._CollectionCache#read: avoid endless busy indicator sometimes when scrolling up
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.core.qunit.i18n.UniversalDateUtils.qunit.js: Improve test stability for different time zones
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.core.qunit.i18n.UniversalDateUtils.qunit.js: Fix failing tests
    • Type: FIX, Description: core/IconPool: make mime type match case insensitive
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/ui/model/odata/ODataMetadata#__getPropertyMetadata: fix nested complex type properties
  • Library: sap.ui.mdc
    • Type: FIX, Description: odata.v4.TableDelegate: Clear selection when updating the binding
  • Library: sap.ui.unified
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.calendar.Month: Improve day re-rendering peformance
  • Library: sap.uxap
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.uxap.ObjectPageLayout: Lazy loading issue corrected
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.uxap.ObjectPageLayout: Remove restrictions for text size

item.title: Version 1.96.40 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.96.40

  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that a PDF loads irrespective of the contentType if isTrustedSource is set to true
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.SinglePlanningCalendar: appointments customData aggregation is written in DOM now
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.core.format.NumberFormat: Invalid groupingSize configuration disables grouping
  • Library: sap.uxap
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.uxap.BlockBase: Error with duplicate ID prevented
